item.title: k3s GitOps Lab | Part 1: Cluster Bootstraping + API PoC Deployment
item.description:
This article covers:

  • Bootstraping a new k3s cluster from scratch
    • creating a free cluster using civo’s #kube100
  • Checking the cluster state
  • Deploy a PoC test API using manifest files (.yaml)
  • General testing

item.title: [ about : k3cloud.gq ]
item.description: Empowering devs to easily bootstrap a Kubernetes DevOps/GitOps complete environment and pipelines using a minimal (and free of charge) k3s cluster. The main idea is to have an easilly deployable (and pseudo production-ready) setup that can be used for dev/test, or as a homelab for tool testing and learning purposes.
